name: Magma Seal
tooltip: On death creates a pool of magma that deals <d ref="duckiesLavaBruteDeath_GroundDoTDamage.amount/duckiesLavaBruteDeath_GroundDoTPersistent.periodic.durations[0]" style="Red"/> damage per second to nearby enemies. Persists for <d ref="duckiesLavaBruteDeath_GroundDoTPersistent.periodic.count*duckiesLavaBruteDeath_GroundDoTPersistent.periodic.durations[0]"/> seconds.
